title.narrative: WASH responses to vulnerable out-of-camp South Sudanese Refugees and host community in WN and KHT

description.narrative: This operational costs project aims at supporting vulnerable out-of-camp South Sudanese Refugees (SSRs) and Host Communities (HCs) by providing sanitation and hygiene services, including school WASH facility provision in Kosti and Rabak localities in White Nile state. Main project activities: WN - Undertake Community Led Total Sanitation (CLTS) program in 25 village in Rabak locality; Pre-triggering and assessment exercise by CLTS trained facilitators for 25 communities; Triggering exercise by CLTS trained facilitators for 25 communities; Follow up visits (regular follow up visits conducted by state and locality teams); Joint ODF verification and certification visits by SMOH and CAFOD and SIDO; ODF celebration and certification. - Construct 6 blocks (one block having four pits) of latrines in six schools (Alingaz, Alamal, Dabat Alganha, Block 29 East, Block 30 and Alhilalgdeda) primary schools. - Conduct one 5-day TOT training on CHAST for the 24 target schoolteachers drawn from the 6 schools (4 teachers from each school). The teachers will thereafter train the students and support them to form school Hygiene Clubs. - Undertake 5-day trainings for 250 community leader and hygiene promotors drawn from the 25 communities, the 250 trainees will be trained in 8 groups each group have 30 persons. Project Activities Khartoum Construction of 150 shared family latrines with adjacent 150 showers, garbage collection and disposal campaigns two campaigns per month and community hygiene promoters (CHPs) to deliver the CHPs will run their job from the clinics -Undertake two 3-day workshop trainings on hygiene promotion for 60 CHPs drawn from Nifasha camp to enable them address hygiene issues towards changing behaviour practices -Undertaking of a one 3-day trainings of 30 members of two primary school PTAs on maintenance and operation of WASH facilities and 5-day CHAST trainings for 30 students, Undertaking of 1 drama and video session on quarterly and provision of Hygiene Kits
